topic.title: Patient Condition Deceased Observation - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:482)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:483)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="ASSERTION" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode) (CONF:485)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:486)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:487)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value/@code="419099009" Dead (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT), where its data type is CD (CONF:488)
SHALL contain a Patient Condition Deceased Cause Observation (CONF:1581, CONF:1582, CONF:1584)
